Meta.title: Techno Groop – Electrical, Low-Current & Server Room Installation | VCA Certified | Poland & Belgium
Meta.description: From trench excavation to server room fit-out: comprehensive electrical installations, structured cabling (Cat6/Cat6a), KNX automation, and BMS integration. VCA-certified crews operating in Poland and Belgium.

Hero.title: Designing The Future.
Hero.subtitle: We specialize in professional electrical installation and know how to make your electrical systems safe, reliable, and long-lasting. We take on projects of any complexity - from private homes to commercial and industrial buildings. Our main advantage is an experienced team, honest approach, and attention to detail. We ensure you simply forget about electrical problems.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.subtitle: End-to-end electrical and low-current solutions — from ground works to commissioning

residential.title: Residential Electrical
residential.description: Complete electrical installations for multi-family and single-family buildings: distribution boards, lighting circuits, socket outlets, underfloor heating controls, and EV charger pre-wiring.

industrial.title: Industrial & Commercial Electrical
industrial.description: High-power installations for production halls, warehouses, and logistics centers: cable tray systems, main switchboards, power factor correction, and emergency lighting (EN 1838).

lowCurrent.title: Low-Current & Data Systems
lowCurrent.description: Structured cabling (Cat6/Cat6a/fiber), server room fit-out, CCTV (IP & analog), access control, intrusion alarms, intercom, and public-address systems.

automation.title: Building Automation (BMS)
automation.description: KNX/DALI lighting control, HVAC integration, BACnet/Modbus gateways, energy metering, and centralized building management system (BMS) programming.

solar.title: Photovoltaics & Energy Storage
solar.description: Commercial PV system installation, inverter commissioning, grid connection, and battery energy storage system (BESS) integration for peak shaving.

Portfolio.title: Our Projects
Portfolio.subtitle: Turnkey electrical and low-current projects delivered for general contractors in Poland and Belgium
Portfolio.interestedCtaDescription: Contact us to discuss your electrical installation needs.

logistics.title: Logistics Center
logistics.description: Complete electrical and lighting installation for a 15,000 m² warehouse facility including LED high-bay lighting and emergency systems.

office.title: Class A Office Building
office.description: Structured cabling (Cat6a), access control, CCTV, and full BMS integration with KNX lighting control.

residential.title: Residential Complex
residential.description: Electrical installations, smart home pre-wiring, and fiber backbone in 48 premium apartments.

prison.title: Antwerp Prison - Government Project
prison.description: Complete electrical and low-current installation for a new government correctional facility. High-security infrastructure including power distribution, Cat6a cabling, control panels, and building automation.

Certificates.title: Certificates & Safety
Certificates.subtitle: European safety standards compliance for every project

vca.title: VCA Certificate
vca.description: All crew members hold valid VCA (Safety, Health and Environment) certification — mandatory for sites in Belgium and the Netherlands.

insurance.title: Full Insurance Coverage
insurance.description: Comprehensive liability insurance (€2M+) and workers' compensation covering all operations in PL and BE.

heights.title: Height Work Certified
heights.description: Certified for scaffolding, boom lifts (MEWP), and rope access — enabling work on high-rise and industrial structures.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: Internal QA/QC procedures: inspection and test plans (ITP), photo documentation, and as-built drawings for every project.

Locations.title: Where We Operate
Locations.subtitle: Delivering projects across the European Union

About.label: About Us
About.title: About Techno Groop
About.subtitle: Full-scope electrical contractor for general contractors
About.description: Techno Groop Sp. z o.o. is a rapidly growing electrical and low-current contractor specializing in turnkey solutions — from initial trench excavation and conduit installation through structured cabling, power distribution, and final BMS commissioning. Since 2023, we have partnered with leading general contractors on industrial, commercial, and residential projects across Poland and Belgium.

partners.label: Partnerships
partners.title: Our Trusted Partners
partners.subtitle: We collaborate with leading European companies to deliver comprehensive solutions

eeg.description: 90 years of experience. 850+ employees. HVAC, electrical & medical installations.

netlink.description: Complete solutions for structured cabling, switching, WiFi & server infrastructure.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To deliver reliable, on-time electrical infrastructure that helps general contractors meet milestones, pass inspections, and hand over projects without delays.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: 22 qualified electricians and low-current technicians — all VCA-certified, trained for height work, and experienced in Cat6/Cat6a cabling, KNX programming, and BMS integration. We're scaling to 50+ specialists to meet growing demand.

values.title: Our Values
values.qualityDesc: IEC/EN-compliant installations, tested and documented. No punch-list surprises.
values.safetyDesc: VCA-certified crews, daily toolbox talks, full insurance — zero compromise.
values.reliabilityDesc: We meet deadlines. If we commit to a date, we deliver.

Reviews.title: Client Reviews
Reviews.subtitle: What general contractors say about working with Techno Groop

review1.text: Professional team, timely delivery, great communication. We recommend Techno Groop for electrical projects.
review1.author: Jan Kowalski

review2.text: We have been working with Techno Groop for a year. Flexibility and work quality are at the highest level.
review2.author: Pierre Dubois

review3.text: Quick response, competitive prices, reliable crew. We will definitely continue our cooperation.
review3.author: Anna Nowak
